name: Horror Maze 2
description:
Horror Maze returns and this time things are much scarier!
Featuring full controller support and 9 new chilling maps


Made by a two man team

Escape from a undead little girl while navigating through a ballpit, Build a roller-coaster car while avoiding evil clown twins, escape from a tall skyscraper while being chased by a possessed builder. And many more chilling scenarios.

More new maps will be added in free future updates!
